Uses of Class
com.dyuproject.protostuff.WriteSession

Packages that use WriteSession
com.dyuproject.protostuff   
 

Uses of WriteSession in com.dyuproject.protostuff
 

Subclasses of WriteSession in com.dyuproject.protostuff
 class BufferedOutput
          Maintains a decent-sized byte buffer for writing.
 class JsonXOutput
          An optimized json output which is efficient in writing numeric keys and pre-encoded utf8 strings (in byte array form).
 class KvpOutput
          An output for serializing kvp-encoded messages (from a byte array as source).
 class ProtostuffOutput
          Dual output for streaming or full buffering.
 class YamlOutput
          An output used for writing data with yaml format.
 

Methods in com.dyuproject.protostuff that return WriteSession
 WriteSession WriteSession.clear()
          The buffer will be cleared (tail will point to the head) and the size will be reset to zero.
